{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Linksys |model=EA8100 |revision=v1.0 |series=AC2600 |asin=B08C5NM4QM |is_manuf=No |manuf=SerComm |manuf_country=Vietnam |availability=now |est_release_date=07/07/2018 |fcc_date=01/08/2020 |fcc_id=Q87-08177 |pcb_id=AWY00C-1.6MM |type=wireless router |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7621AT |cpu1_cspeed=880 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX30LF1G18AC-TI |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CC128M16JR-DK |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, JP1 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7615N;MEDIATEK, ARM, MT7615N, 1742-BFSL, ACMS8L31; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=MHF4 |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |wi2_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi2_chip1_model=MT7615N |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=MHF4 |wi2_txchains=4 |wi2_rxchains=4 |wi2_sstreams=4 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=5GHz WLAN FEM;Skyworks;SKY85728-11;;4; |flags=Wave2, MU-MIMO, 256QAM, DFS (master) |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac }}
:• '''1733''' Mbps - 4SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''800''' Mbps - 4SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan., 256QAM) = '''''AC2600'' class'''
{{TagLine|Max-Stream AC2600 MU-MIMO Gigabit WiFi Router}} :[https://www.linksys.com/us/wireless-routers/traditional-routers/linksys-ea8100-max-stream-dual-band-wifi-5-router/p/p-ea8100/ Product page] {{SupportPage|vendor=Linksys|region=sg|model=EA8100|pid=01t34000004ddY4AAI}} (v1.0/2.0) [[MediaTek]] chips are a guess based on the published CPU and Wi-Fi specs. {{See also|Linksys EA7500 v2|Linksys|SerComm}} {{WiFiCert|WFA77942|06/08/2018|14379}} ===Models=== *[[Linksys EA8100]] (v1.0) *[[Linksys EA8100 v2]] (v2.0) :FCC ID: Q87-08177 (2020-01-08) ===News=== * [http://www.starhub.com/about-us/newsroom/2018/july/starhub-world-first-linksys-ea8100-router.html ''Linksys EA8100 Max-Stream MU-MIMO Router'' on '''StarHub'''] * [https://www.hardwarezone.com.sg/tech-news-starhub-will-be-worlds-first-offer-linksys-new-ea8100-ac2600-router ''Linksys EA8100 MU-MIMO AC2600 Router'' on '''HardwareZone'''] ==Images== File:Front-ea8100-v1.jpg|PCB top File:Back-ea8100-v1.jpg|PCB bottom File:EA8100 V1 CPU RAM.jpg|CPU and RAM File:EA8100 V1 2G CHIP.jpg|2.4GHz chip File:EA8100 V1 5G CHIP.jpg|5GHz chip File:EA8100 V1 SKY85728.jpg|5GHz FEM [[Has images::internal| ]] __NOTOC__
